It provides small to medium size LED back light modules, motorcycle and vehicle LED headlight modules, light guide films, and plastic injection molding products, as well as LED packaging, design, and fabrication services. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3545.TW.summary: FocalTech Systems Co., Ltd. provides LCD display driver solutions worldwide. The company offers IDC, fingerprint identification, display driver, and touch chips. It also provides human-machine interface solutions, including 2D/3D touch controller, super in- cell IDC, fingerprint sensor, and display driver for smart electronic devices. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3555.TWO.summary: iROC Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and sale of natural products in Japan. The company offers drinking water under the VACHI; skin care products under the QINGSKIN; and chicken essence under the DDDrops brand names. It serves customers through online shops and distributors. The company was formerly known as Skymedi Corporation. iROC Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3556.TWO.summary: eGalax_eMPIA Technology Inc. provides touch panel solutions. The company offers projected capacitive IC and controller solutions, resistive touch solutions, surface capacitive touch controllers, surface acoustic wave touch sensors and controllers, and accessories. It serves the industrial, commercial, gaming, medical, banking, military, transportation, and consumer electronic sectors. eGalax_eMPIA Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3567.TWO.summary: ETREND Hightech Corp. engages in testing and processing electronic components in Taiwan. It offers IC and wafer testing services. The company is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3581.TWO.summary: Zen Voce Corporation manufactures and sells optoelectronic and semiconductor dicing saws, and assembly and testing products. It engages in the design and manufacture of IC packaging machine and bumping; wafer cutting and cleaning machines; and board cutting and cleaning machines. The company also designs and manufactures test products, such as wafer test probe card PCBs; IC test HIFIX and CHANG kits; SOCKET IC test products; IC handlers; and SOCKET IC burn-in test products, as well as offers dicing and jig saws, tapes, and ball mount tooling products. It serves semiconductors, optoelectronics, microelectronics, and LCD equipment industries. The company was formerly known as Trutek Cooperation. Zen Voce Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3583.TW.summary: Scientech Corporation supplies products and services for the semiconductor, flat panel display, LED, data storage, scientific instruments, and high-tech related industries. The company offers chemical analysis and biotechnology equipment; remote control system; camera lens; flat panel display; mask/reticle and semiconductor front-end process equipment; MEMS/compound semiconductor/LED products; semiconductor packaging and testing equipment; 3D printing equipment; and wet benches/single wafer wet process equipment, and temporary bonding/de-bonding/glass recycle tools. It also provides wafer reclaiming services; repair, overhaul, and calibration services; and used tools, such as refurbished metrology, Nikon stepper/scanner, TEL track, and ion implanter tools. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3588.TW.summary: Leadtrend Technology Corporation operates as an IC fables company primarily in Taiwan. It offers AC-DC controllers, such as primary side regulator controllers, isolated green mode products, isolated high voltage green mode products, synchronous rectification drivers, and transition mode PFC controllers; USB type-c port controllers; and LED application products, including 3 in 1 flexible dimming processors, AC/DC LED lighting controllers/drivers, current ripple suppressors, and CC/CV secondary side controllers. The company also provides TV/monitor, USB PD/PPS, networking, and LED lighting solutions. Its products are used in technical articles, networking, notebooks, monitors/TVs, chargers, and LED lightings. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3592.TWO.summary: Raydium Semiconductor Corporation provides integrated circuit (IC) solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers driver IC, power IC, touch control IC, and power management and timing controller IC solutions for artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, smart TVs, professional gaming, computer information, automotive, and industrial control products, as well as mobile and wearable devices. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3627.TWO.summary: Arima Lasers Corporation manufactures and sells laser diodes in Taiwan. The company's products are used in various applications, including optical disk drives, optical communication networks, laser mouse, laser display, photodynamic therapy, laser printers, bar code scanners, distance measurements, levelers, etc. It also offers laser modules; high power products; surface mount device of laser diode; and OEM services, such as die bonding, in process quality check, wire bonding, cap sealing, auto laser marking, and testing services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3640.T.summary: Densan Co., Ltd. operates as an information service company in Japan. The company offers business information systems, such as resident's information, welfare, industrial planning, and internal information systems for local governments; and private enterprise information systems, including distribution industry relations, finance business relationship, news media relations, medical care, and other systems. It also provides data center services comprising housing, network, operation and monitoring, individual operation, backup, virtual server, and cloud services; connection, rental server, and homepage creation services; and information systems planning, design, development, and maintenance services. In addition, the company is involved in the development, sales, and rental and maintenance of software; sale of information and communications, and information processing equipment, as well as its peripheral equipment and operational software; rental of information processing equipment and building space; and installation and maintenance of electrical equipment. Further, it engages in planning, research, and development of information network technology, information communication and processing equipment, and peripheral devices; plans, develops, and sells digital content; and provision of information communication and processing technology education and guidance services, and information consulting systems. Additionally, the company is involved in worker dispatch business. Densan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Nagano, Japan.

3661.TW.summary: Alchip Technologies, Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides silicon design and manufacturing solutions for application specific integrated circuit and System on chip (SoC) companies. It offers SoC design, production, and IP solutions, as well as multi project wafer services. The company's products are primarily used in network, storage, and computing devices; HDTVs, mobile phones, digital cameras/video cameras, entertainment systems, portable media players, tablet PC master chips, and peripheral chips; and surveillance systems, entertainment machines, and medical equipment and instruments. It operates in China, Japan, the United States, Taiwan, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3680.TWO.summary: Gudeng Precision Industrial Co., Ltd provides technology services worldwide. The company offers mask handling solutions, such as ultraviolet reticle POD, reticle SMIF POD, and mask package; and wafer handling solutions, including front opening unified POD, multi-application carriers, FOUP, wafer cassettes, shipping boxes, and cassette boxes. It also provides equipment comprising mask cleaners and purge stations; and cleaning services, mask management and tracking systems, and mask accessories. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3707.TWO.summary: Episil Holding Inc. engages in the epitaxial wafer foundry, power semiconductor, and analog integrated circuit businesses in Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Episil Technologies Inc. Episil Holding Inc. was founded in 1985 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3FS.F.summary: Kalray S.A. provides low-power and time-critical processor solutions in France. It offers massively parallel manycore array processors. The company also provides data center solutions, including Kalray Target Controller, a family of storage solutions offering an all-in-one system to build optimized NVMe-of just a bunch of flash; and TurboBoost, a solution to offload the encryption/decryption operations involved in secure communications. In addition, it offers software development kits, such as AccessCore that allows customers to program the massively parallel processor array using standard languages comprising C/C++/OpenCL, programming models, APIs, and tools; and Kalray Neural Network, a tool for implementing deep learning networks on the massively parallel processor array, as well as other software and tools. Further, the company provides PCIe and PCIe acceleration boards for storage, networking, cryptography applications; and development platforms. It serves autonomous vehicle, aerospace/avionic, artificial intelligence, data storage, data networking, and computer vision markets. The company is headquartered in Montbonnot Saint Martin, France.

4919.TW.summary: Nuvoton Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital/analog/mixed signal semiconductor company in the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It operates through General Integrated Circuit (IC) Product and Foundry Service segments. The company engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of logic ICs; and manufacture, testing, and OEM of 6-inch wafers. It also researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells microcontrollers; microprocessors; application specific SoCs devices; audio amplifiers, CODECs, converters, and enhancements; and ISD voice ICs, including ISD ChipCorder products and Voiceband CODECs. In addition, the company provides cloud computing products comprising embedded controllers, hardware monitors, I/O and security devices, iBMC products, and voltage level shifters; power management products, which consist of power switches and voltage regulators; and Internet of things (IoT) solutions. Further, it operates IoT for various IoT solutions; operates emWin platform for graphical user interface solution to create graphics for the embedded system; and offers professional semiconductor foundry services. Additionally, the company engages in the wholesale of computers, supplements, and software; and provides computer software services. Its products are used in automotive, computing, medical, portable devices, audio/video products, and consumer and industrial electronics, as well IoT security and smart home appliances. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan. Nuvoton Technology Corporation is a subsidiary of Winbond Electronics Corporation.

4923.TWO.summary: Force MOS Technology Co., LTD. engages in the design, development, and sale of MOSFETs and analog ICs in Taiwan. It offers bipolar transistors; diodes and rectifiers; and power management products for light electric vehicles technology and brushless DC motor control applications. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4925.TWO.summary: JMicron Technology Corp. operates as an IC design company in Taiwan and internationally. The company designs high-speed data and signal interfaces, such as 3.1 5Gbps, USB 3.2 10Gbps and USB 3.2 20Gbps to connect them to SATA/PCIe/UFS; PCIe interface to SATA interface; and SATA 1.5Gbps/SATA 3Gbps/SATA 6Gbps, and SATA port multiplier/port selector, as well as bridge controllers for SATA to PATA interface. It also provides external data storage products, such as single bay controllers for USB 2.0/USB 3.0/USB 3.1/USB 3.2 host interfaces; dual-/multi-bay bridge controllers for external multiple-bay HDDs, RAID, and SATA port multipliers and port selectors; storage device controllers; and universal flash storage products. In addition, the company offers hard disk drive duplicators and surveillance storage systems, and NAS devices with RAID functionality. JMicron Technology Corp. is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4945.TWO.summary: Sentelic Corporation operates as an IC design company in Taiwan, China, and Japan. The company offers mixed-signal, ASIC, firmware/software, and multi-media processing services; fan motor drive control IC's for servers, communication equipment, cloud data centers, and 5G base stations; and cooling fans for servers, telecommunication switching equipment, gaming graphics cards, and mining hardware. Sentelic Corporation was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4951.TWO.summary: Feature Integration Technology Inc. designs, markets, and commercializes ICs and controllers. It offers I/O controllers and I/F management products, such as eSPI/LPC/USB/PCIE I/F controllers; super hardware monitors + SIOs; hardware keyboard controllers; USB consumer IR receiver ICs for Windows Vista/Windows 7; power saving (EUP) SIOs and controllers; transceivers and buffers; SIOs with microcontrollers (uSIO); and bus controllers and transceivers. The company also provides environment sensors and glue logic ICs, including environment sensors and fan controllers, pure logic ICs, performance controllers, and real time clocks; power management and ACPI controllers, such as ACPI, switching, and multi-phase linear controllers; micro-processors; LED driver ICs; interface and connectivity products; and USB type-C and power delivery products, as well as USB fast charging products. It offers its IC products for various applications in personal computers, computer peripherals, digital consumer electronic products, and information appliance products. The company sells its products through professional IC distributors. Feature Integration Technology Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

4952.TW.summary: Generalplus Technology Inc. researches, develops, and sells integrated circuits (ICs) worldwide. It offers speech/tone synthesizers, sound processors, controllers, and one battery speech synthesizers; LCD controllers and driver; multimedia processors; automobile video recorders; remote, motor, gTouch, and charger controls, as well as controllers for home applications; flash products; and motor drivers, audio amplifiers, linear regulators, ADC and microphone pre-amplifiers, I/O bus extenders, USB bridge and socket servers, touch applications, USB headset solutions, and three-axis accelerometers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4958.TW.summary: Zhen Ding Technology Holding Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacturing and sale of various printed circuit board (PCB) products in the United States, Mainland China, Taiwan, Singapore, and internationally. The company offers high density interconnection products for use in various electrical products, such as mobile devices, PCs, digital cameras, E-books, and others; and flexible printed circuits for use in telecom, computer, and consumer electronic applications. It also provides rigid PCBs for use in networking, big data computing, cloud storage, and automotive and consumer electronic applications; and integrated circuit substrates for use in communication, computer, consumer, and other products. The company was formerly known as Foxconn Advanced Technology Limited and changed its name to Zhen Ding Technology Holding Limited in June 2011. Zhen Ding Technology Holding Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

4961.TW.summary: Fitipower Integrated Technology Inc. research, design, and development of LCD driver ICs and analogs, and digital and mixed-signal power management ICs in Taiwan. Its power management products comprise buck DC-DC, boost DC-DC, linear regulator, LCD power, power switch, WLED driver, reset IC, and motor driver, as well as other products, such as PMUs, ASICs, etc.; and display driver products include AV/tablet, DSC, NBMNT, TV, and gate products. The company's products are used for various applications consisting of LCD-TVs, notebooks, networking, portable devices, set-top boxes, CCTV/security, desktops, LED lighting, and TFT-LCD driver products. Fitipower Integrated Technology Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4966.TWO.summary: Parade Technologies, Ltd., a fabless semiconductor company, designs, develops, and sells high-speed interface standards, and touch controller and display processing integrated circuit (IC) chips for products used in computers, consumer electronics, and display panels. The company offers display port LCD timing controllers, embedded display port timing controllers, display port format converters, display port transmitters and receivers, and scalers with display port and high definition multimedia interface (HDMI) inputs; high-speed interface solutions; display port based solutions; display port repeater and switch products, including serial advanced technology architecture, PCI express, HDMI/DVI, and universal serial bus products; source drivers; and truetouch controllers, and touch and display driver integrations, as well as mixed-signal ICs. It operates in South Korea, China, Taiwan, Japan, and internationally. Parade Technologies, Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in George Town, Cayman Islands.

4968.TW.summary: RichWave Technology Corporation designs, develops, and sells radio frequency (RF) integrated circuits in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers a portfolio of RF front-end components for Wi-Fi, such as power amplifiers, low noise amplifiers, switches, and front-end modules; mobility switches, mobility and GPS LNA products, and power amplifiers; RF components, and Internet of Things (IoT) low noise amplifiers and switches; automotive front-end modules and switches; cable network switches; motion detection sensors; and GPS/WiFi SAW filters, cellular SAW filters, IoT SAW filters, and WiFi diplexers. It also provides single-chip broadcast IC tuners, as well as a line of wireless video/audio transmission chipsets for different ISM bands. The company's products are used in various applications, including networking, mobile, smart home, internet of things, wireless media, broadcasting, and automotive. RichWave Technology Corporation was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4971.TWO.summary: IntelliEPI Inc. (Cayman) manufactures and sells epitaxy-based compound semiconductor epitaxy wafers to the electronics and optoelectronics industries worldwide. The company utilizes its proprietary real time in situ growth monitoring technology on molecular beam epitaxy (MBE) systems for the manufacturing of epi-wafers on gallium arsenide (GaAs) and indium phosphide (InP) substrates. Its GaAs based products include pseudo-morpic high electron mobility transistors and MHEMT products; and InP based products comprise hetero-junction bi-polar transistors, HEMT, RTT, and RTD. The company also provides Sb based products, such as type II SLS photodetectors, GaAsSb-base InP HBT, and epi-ready GaSb substrates; and mismatched Epi products comprising III-V on Si, III-V on Ge, and high in content InGaAs on Si. In addition, it offers opto-electronics, including avalanche photo diodes, lasers, high-speed high-frequency surface-emitting lasers, optical receivers, quantum well infrared photodetectors, modulators, and quantum cascade lasers, as well as infrared light detectors. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4979.TWO.summary: LuxNet Corporation designs, develops, and manufactures optical semiconductor devices and packaged optical components in Taiwan. The company provides laser and photo diode chips, transmitters, receivers, and optical sub-assemblies. Its products are used in high speed voice video and data communications for networking, storage, and cable TV, as well as optical communication applications. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4DS.AX.summary: 4DS Memory Limited engages in the research and development of non-volatile memory technology. It develops interface switching ReRAM products for storage class memory. 4DS Memory Limited has a collaboration with the imec. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in West Perth, Australia.

4NO.F.summary: NeoPhotonics Corporation develops, manufactures, and sells optoelectronic products that transmit and receive high speed digital optical signals for cloud and hyperscale data center internet content provider and telecom networks worldwide. It offers high speed products, including transmitter, receiver, and switching products for 400G and optical transmission applications over distances of 2 to 2,000 kilometers; ultra-narrow linewidth tunable lasers that generate ultra-pure wavelength or color for coherent transmission; and integrated coherent receivers (ICRs) that decode the phase and polarization encoded coherent optical signals. The company also provides pluggable coherent transceivers that combine ultra-narrow linewidth laser with coherent receiver and performance coherent modulator; and 100G products for data center applications. In addition, it offers multi-cast switching solutions for 100G and above coherent systems; and network products and solutions, such as arrayed wavelength gratings, multiplexers, and filters used in dense wavelength division multiplexing systems. The company sells its products to network equipment manufacturers through a direct sales force in North America, Europe, and Asia. The company was formerly known as NanoGram Corporation and changed its name to NeoPhotonics Corporation in 2002. NeoPhotonics Corporation was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in San Jose, California.

5236.TWO.summary: Sunplus Innovation Technology Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and markets microcontrollers and system-on-chips with embedded software solutions in Taiwan. It offers wired optical mice, wireless desktops, and MCU for HID and toy devices; and Web, NB, and IOT camera controllers. The company's products are used in human interface devices, PC external HDD/ODD drives, and PC/NB camera and industry control market segments. It also provides image data services for AI datasets, including data collection, labeling and tagging, verification, model training, 2D bounding box, line and polygonal annotation, semantic segmentation, landmark/key point annotation, other annotation services, product features tagging, queue monitoring, data transcription, emotion analysis, feedback entry, data entry-data capture, de-identification service, training, and system integration. The company is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. Sunplus Innovation Technology Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Sunplus Technology Company Limited.

5245.TWO.summary: WiseChip Semiconductor Inc. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets organic light emitting diodes (OLEDs) in Taiwan. Its principal products include OLED displays, full color displays, and monochrome displays; and bendable OLEDs, transparent OLEDs, matrix OLEDs, etc. used in consumer, PC peripheral, industrial, medical, automotive, and communication applications. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Chu-Nan, Taiwan.

5262.TWO.summary: Gigastone Corporation manufactures and sells memory modules, wireless/networking modules and control ICs, and display modules in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include memory cards; card readers; power banks; cables; flash drives and readers; adapters, wireless charging pads, headsets, and travel routers; and WiFi smart batteries. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5269.TW.summary: ASMedia Technology Inc. operates as a fabless IC design company. The company offers USB host and device controllers, including USB3.2 Gen1, USB 3.2 Gen2x1, USB 3.2 Gen2x2, and USB4 controllers; PCIe bridge and SATA controllers; and high speed signal switches. It serves motherboard vendors and branded OEMs worldwide. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5274.TWO.summary: ASPEED Technology Inc. operates as a fabless integrated circuit design company in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. It offers server management product lines; PC and AV extensions; desktop virtualization infrastructures; and Cupola360, a spherical image processor for 360-degree/180-degree cameras. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

5299.TWO.summary: Excelliance MOS Corporation operates as a power device and IC design company in Taiwan. The company is involved in the power semiconductor process development, as well as power device, IC, and system design activities. Its products include power MOSFETs, Schottky rectifiers, AC/DC and DC/DC power ICs, and LED drivers. The company's products are primarily used to the power system of electronic products, including personal computers, notebooks, pads, monitors, TVs, LED lighting, switching power, and other consumer electronics. Excelliance MOS Corporation was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

5302.TWO.summary: Syntek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. operates as a fabless IC design company in Asia. It offers car DVRs/miniDVs, PC/NB camera controllers, and microcontrollers, as well as wireless solutions. The company also develops products for photo capturing and video recording applications. In addition, it offers wireless IP connected multimedia recording solutions; and system-on-chip solutions. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5314.TWO.summary: Myson Century, Inc. provides micro-controllers (MCU), automobile IT solutions, fiber solutions, and motor control solutions in Taiwan. The company also offers dual CMOS operational amplifiers, as well as ASIC design services. Its products are used in automobile, motor control and drive, embedded networking, and optical network applications. Myson Century, Inc. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

5344.TWO.summary: Vate Technology Co., Ltd. provides integrated circuit (IC) testing services in Taiwan and China. The company offers IC testing services related to the service of wafer probing and final testing; BURN IN, a test service on electrical components and final products; and LED products. It also provides chip probing test, final test, SLT system module test, CMOS image sensor testing, and back end services, as well as sells LED panel light products. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

5471.TW.summary: Sonix Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells integrated circuits (ICs) in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides microcontrollers for use in computer peripherals, communication products, remote controllers, intelligent charging, home appliances, car alarm systems, security systems, electronic scales, thermometers, blood pressure monitors, tire gauges, and health equipment. It also offers voice controllers for interactive and educational electronic toys, handheld games, educational learning appliances, and other devices; and a range of video/image controllers. In addition, the company provides wireless video and audio solutions for remote control toys, baby monitors, and wireless home security systems; optical identification device chipsets for education, entertainment, and digital home appliances; multimedia network platforms for consumer Wi-Fi IP cameras makers; and USB controllers for audio. Sonix Technology Co.,Ltd. as founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

5S6.F.summary: Sensera Limited operates as an Internet of Things (IOT) solution provider that delivers sensor-based products transforming real-time data into meaningful information, action, and value in the United States and Germany. The company operates in two segments, Microdevices and IoT Solutions. The Microdevices segment designs and manufactures micro sensors and micro-fabricated components. The IoT Solutions segment represents the embedded location platform, which delivers location awareness for safety and productivity solutions across industrial and consumer markets covering real-time positioning and concurrent wireless communication. Sensera Limited was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Melbourne, Australia.

600584.SS.summary: JCET Group Co., Ltd. provides semiconductor system integration packaging and test services worldwide. The company offers wafer level, system in package, flip chip, and wire bonding products for various semiconductor applications, such as mobile, communication, compute, consumer, automotive and industry, etc. It also provides design and characterization, research and development, water bump, package assembly, shipment, and reliability test services. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Changjiang Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JCET Group Co., Ltd. in November 2019. JCET Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

600703.SS.summary: Sanan Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and marketing of LED epitaxial wafers and chips, compound solar cells, compound semiconductors, semiconductor and communication chips, and sapphire substrates in China and internationally. The company's LED lighting products include bulbs, tube lamps, down lights, spot lights, floodlights, fill lights, tunnel lights, and smart and horticulture lighting products primarily used in homes, shopping malls, hotels, office buildings, and public streets. Its gallium arsenide semiconductor chips are mainly used in microelectronics, including wireless communications, fiber optic communications, automotive, and other fields; gallium nitride semiconductor chips are used in various industries, such as power management; and management modules for electronic products comprising laptops, tablets, telephones, electric vehicles, solar cells, and telecommunications base stations. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

600770.SS.summary: Jiangsu Zongyi Co.,LTD engages in the clean energy, advanced technology, and integrated finance businesses. It constructs and manages photovoltaic power stations in Italy, the United States, Germany, Bulgaria, Romania, and the Xinjiang region. The company also provides information technology products, including high-end chips, such as hearing aids; micro-crypto products; and smart card security products, as well as offers traditional Chinese medicine products and new materials. In addition, it is involved in the equity investment activities. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Nantong, China.

603005.SS.short_name: CHINA WAFER LEVEL CSP CO LTD
603005.SS.long_name: China Wafer Level CSP Co., Ltd.
603005.SS.summary: China Wafer Level CSP Co., Ltd. provides wafer level miniaturization technologies and processes for the electronics industry. It offers image sensor, biometric identification, and ambient light sensor chips, as well as medical electronic devices. The company also provides infrastructure solutions, including design, test, and logistics; design chain management; design for manufacturing; design for cost; full design and verification of WL, leadframe, laminate, etc.; electrical, thermal, and mechanical characterization; and quick turn prototype services. In addition, it offers assembly services, such as turnkey solutions for TSV, wire bond, and flip chip; high-volume manufacturing; wafer finishing and 2/3D assembly; wafer to wafer and die to wafer bonding; micro-joining; integrated and SMT passives; and FA and reliability testing services, including package and board level, bump reliability, underfill/EMC adhesion, drop and bend tests, solder joint reliability prediction, materials lab, and failure analysis. The company serves consumer, computing, communication, and medical markets. China Wafer Level CSP Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

603893.SS.summary: Fuzhou Rockchip Electronics Co.,Ltd operates as a fabless semiconductor company in China. It offers professional end-to-end system-on-chip solutions for use in tablets, notebooks, Chromebooks, IPTV/OTT-boxes, Internet of things, smart audio products, intelligent video application in smartphone, robotics, and other smart devices, as well as drone, IPC, and CVR applications. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

603936.SS.summary: Bomin Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells PCBs in China and internationally. The company primarily offers high density interconnect, general double-sided, multi-layer, microwave high-frequency, heavy copper, metal base/core and flexible, and rigid-flex boards. Its products are used in communication equipment, medical devices, military hi-tech products, test systems, aeronautics and astronautics, household electronic products, automotive products, industrial control electronics, consumer electronics, high frequency microwave electronics, and other fields. Bomin Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Meizhou, China.

603986.SS.summary: GigaDevice Semiconductor (Beijing) Inc., a fabless company, provides memory technology and IC solutions. It provides serial peripheral interface (SPI) NOR flash, SPI NAND flash, parallel NAND flash, known good die, and cross-reference memory products, as well as microcontrollers for use in automotive/industrial, computing, consumer, Internet of Things, network/telecom, and mobile communication applications. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

605358.SS.summary: Hangzhou Lion Electronics Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and supply of microwave radio frequency integrated circuit chips in China. It serves customers in mobile phone, wireless area network, and broadband applications. The company is based in Hangzhou, China.

6103.TWO.summary: Avid Electronics Corp. researches, develops, produces, and markets IC chip series products. The company offers audio-visual related IC products; analog IC products, such as power supply and lighting driver products; and wireless transmission system chips. It also provides external hard disk boxes, driving recorders, Bluetooth speakers, SD memory cards and flash drives, solid state hard disks, wireless charging equipment, air purification intelligent sweeping robots, LCD displays, and WIFI connection products. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6104.TWO.summary: Genesys Logic, Inc., a fabless IC design house, provides high-speed interface technologies. The company offers USB hub controllers; storage products, such as card reader controllers; repeater products comprising USB, PCI express, and DP redrivers; image and video products consisting of scanner controllers, fisheye image processors, and PC-cameras; silicon intellectual properties; and USB host charger controllers and other products, as well as provides support services. Its products are used in computing and display applications. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6113.TWO.summary: ASEC International Corporation distributes semiconductor components in the Asia Pacific. Its products are used in PC; Internet; telecommunication; MCU; electronic products; multimedia software/hardware; and energy saving and carbon reduction products, including mobile TV, LCD TV, mobile phone, wireless broadband, internet, MP3, networking and telecom appliances, MPEG encoder/decoder, set-top box, CMOS sensor, adapter, HDTV, IP phone and various multimedia software, LED lighting, and green energy products. The company was formerly known as ASEC Company and changed its name to ASEC International Corporation in 1998. ASEC International Corporation was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6127.TWO.summary: LEATEC Fine Ceramics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chip alumina fine ceramic substrates in Taiwan. It develops high-voltage resistor, variable resistor, array, and chip resistor substrates, as well as chip array substrates. The company also offers fine ceramics, such as alumina, LED, aluminum nitride, laser machining ceramic, and lapping and polishing substrates, as well as ceramic cores and Zirconia toughened alumina; and green energy products, including junction boxes, compact combiner boxes, and tools and other products, as well as PV connectors, cables, and cable assemblies. In addition, it provides car-used electronic substrates comprising LED package, hybrid IC, and sensor substrates. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6129.TWO.summary: Princeton Technology Corporation operates as a fabless IC design company in Taiwan. It provides IC technology for energy-saving solutions, including a series of energy-saving ballast driver ICs, LED lighting/backlight driver ICs, and brushless DC motor ICs for use in various indoor/outdoor lighting and motor control products. The company also offers display driver, multimedia audio controller, LED driver, motor driver, RF, encoder/decoder, remote control, GPS, I/O expander, power, and PFC controller ICs, as well as ASICs, microcontrollers, and automotive solutions. Its products are used in automotive dash-board and multimedia devices, portable audio players, digital TVs, home audio/video appliances, DSCs, DSLRs, monitoring cameras, and car security systems. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6130.TWO.summary: Singbao International Co. Ltd engages in the wholesale of Chinese medicines, western medicines, medical equipment, slimming products, and cosmetics in Taiwan and Asia. It is also involved in the research, development, production, and sale of wireless communication integrated circuits; and the operation of various beauty salons, as well as offers other services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6138.TWO.summary: Anpec Electronics Corporation designs power ICs, mixed signal ICs, and power discrete devices in Taiwan. Its primary products include power management ICs, audio amplifier ICs, LCD controller/driver ICs, hall effect ICs, and power MOSFETs. The company also provides switching regulators, lighting and display products, linear regulators, switches, LCD bias convertors, battery powered systems, DVR powered systems, audio products, analog to digital converters, battery management solutions, voltage supervisors, and motor drivers. Its products are used in various applications, including motherboards, VGA cards, notebooks, mobiles, PND systems, LCD TVs, LCD panels, fans, inverters, WLAN cards, and ATX power supply products, as well as in communication IC and micro-controller applications. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6147.TWO.summary: Chipbond Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides services for backend assembly processing of LCD driver integrated circuits (ICs) in Taiwan, the United States, and internationally. The company offers turnkey services, which comprise bumping manufacturing services, including gold, solder, and copper bumping services; redistribution layer services; wafer surface processing services, such as back side metal and dielectric layer coating process services; wafer grinding, dicing, and picking and placing services; package and testing services comprising driver and non-driver IC testing, driver IC package, and wafer level chip scale packaging services; final inspection and failure analysis services; and chip tray design and manufacturing services. It also invests in, develops, manufactures, and sells electronic components, as well as tape automated bonding, tape carrier, and others. Chipbond Technology Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6168.TW.summary: Harvatek Corporation designs, manufactures, tests, exports, and sells semiconductor chips and LEDs in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides visible LED products, such as PCB, lead frame, COX, lamp, and PLCC, as well as digital displays; infrared LED products, which include emitters, photo transistors, photo diodes, and interrupters; UVC LED products comprising water tank types, water flow types, and air puri products; and OD CSP modules/self-made equipment. Its products are used in home appliances, gaming accessories, optical touch screens, mobile devices, wearables, and security measures. The company serves OEM manufacturers, trade retailers, and design houses. Harvatek Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6173.TWO.summary: Prosperity Dielectrics Co., Ltd. manufactures and exports ceramic dielectric powders and multilayer ceramic chip capacitors in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific. Its products include ceramic dielectric powders, disc type semi-conductive capacitor elements, multilayer ceramic chip capacitors, chip resistors, diodes, inductors, and coils. The company also provides SBL elements. Its products are used in power, communications, and consumer applications; and medical, military, and measurement equipment, as well as the automotive sector. Prosperity Dielectrics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6198.TWO.summary: AverLogic Technologies, Corp., a fabless semiconductor company, provides application specific memory and video processing circuits worldwide. It offers video frame and line FIFOs, video surveillance controller ICs, LCD display controller ICs, video format conversion ICs, video decoder and ADC ICs, and H.264 video streaming SOCs. The company provides H.264 video streaming, video conversion, LCD display, multiple video display, video decoding, and FIFO memory solutions. It offers its products through a network of representatives and distributors. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6202.TW.summary: Holtek Semiconductor Inc. researches, develops, produces, manufactures, and sells integrated circuits. The company provides a range of general purpose and specialized types of microcontrollers for use in the areas of voice, communication, computer peripheral, household appliance, medical equipment, automotive, security, etc.; and power management devices, LCD and LED drive/control chips, ultra-high resolution fingerprint identification sensors, various sensor modules, and other peripheral devices. It also offers MCU that are used for general purpose, LCD display, 1.8V~5.5V, USB, motor control, OPA, health and measurement, security and safety, touch, voice and music, battery and power management, and special purpose; and wireless and communication devices, display drivers, modules, EEPROM memory, and analog and video devices. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6233.TWO.summary: Prolific Technology Inc. operates as an IC design company and ASIC design service provider for USB smart I/O, intelligent green energy saving, and mixed-mode hall sensor solutions. The company offers IC and SOC solutions for USB serial/parallel converters, USB storage products, brushless motor drivers, hall sensors, power meters, and MEMS motion sensing products. It sells its products in Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan, Korea, Canada, and the United States. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6261.TWO.summary: Youngtek Electronics Corporation provides semiconductor back-end foundry services in Taiwan. The company engages in wafer testing, wafer grinding and cutting and die picking, IC product testing, special substrate cutting, test program development, platform conversion, engineering support, and valet shipping; and AOI automatic optical inspection of LED dies and VCSEL components, die picking inspection, visual inspection, and other post-process OEM activities. It also offers IC sorting and bonding; WLCSP die sorting packaging; label flip-chip binding; and die and LED bonding machines. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6291.TWO.summary: Analog Integrations Corporation, a fabless IC company, designs, manufactures, tests, and markets analog integrated circuits in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers power conversion products, including low and ultra-low dropout linear regulators, DDR regulators, and voltage references; DC/DC converters for high power and portable applications; and LED backlights and lighting solutions. It also provides power management products, such as USB and regulatory USB power switches, and bare-bone USB switches; supervisory products; and NiMH/NiCd battery chargers, Li-ion battery protection products, and high current drivers. Its products are used in 3C applications in the areas of LCD TV, DSC, mobile phone, MP3, PMP, etc. Analog Integrations Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6315.T.summary: TOWA Corporation designs, develops, manufactures, and sells semiconductor manufacturing equipment and high-precision molds in Japan and internationally. Its products include molding equipment, singulation equipment, ultra-precision molds, THPL-CBN end mills, and TEN-systems; and laser processing equipment, as well as fine plastic molded products. The company also offers manufacturing systems for electronic components, precision-molded and assembly products, medical-use equipment, electronic-communications equipment; and remodeling/repairing, and contract processing services. In addition, it sells used equipment. The company was formerly known as TOWA Precision Industries Limited and changed its name to TOWA Corporation in December 1988. TOWA Corporation was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

6338.T.summary: Takatori Corporation manufactures and sells semiconductor-related equipment, LCD panel related equipment, multi wire saws and textile machinery, and medical devices primarily in Japan and internationally. It offers precision cutting machinery for sapphire, SiC, and GaN substrates; solar cells; quartz crystals; LT and LN products; GaAs, Gap, and InP products; magnets; ceramics; and materials for research and development. The company also offers semiconductor equipment for LED's, TAIKO processes, wafer protective tape lamination and removal machines, DFR lamination machines, wafer mounters, UV irradiation equipment, film resist lamination machines, package mounters, substrate(H-WSS) processing equipment, and MEMS. In addition, it provides display equipment for LCD panel surface cleaning, polarizer attaching, module production process, and touch panel bonding process machines; carbon fiber/thin film solar cell sheet and apparel-related textile equipment; and medical devices. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Kashihara, Japan.

6411.TWO.summary: Amazing Microelectronic Corp. provides electrostatic discharge (ESD) protection related solutions in Taiwan. It offers ESD solutions for use in industrial, automotive, and LCM panel, as well as IPC, and DVR and medical electronics applications; and EMI filters for use in LCD/camera display, multimedia card/secure digital memory card, and keypad products of mobile phones and hand held portable devices. It also provides analog switches for video, LAN, Bus, and USB applications; HDMI re-drivers and switches; and RS485/RS232 interface IC solutions for industrial and medical process control, automobile electronics, monitoring system, and building automation networks. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6415.TW.summary: Silergy Corp. researches, develops, designs, and sells a range of power- management integrated circuits (ICs) in China and internationally. The company also offers single output step down, dual output step down, single output step up, and linear regulators; protection switches; electricity metering and embedded measurement ICs; ESD products; AC input LED lighting products; Li-Ion/Li-polymer battery chargers; motor drivers; audio amplifiers; and light sensors. In addition, it provides electronic components and related technical services. Its products are used in LED lighting, tablet computers, notebook computers, solid-state drives, video surveillance systems, servers, digital set-top boxes, smart phones, televisions, LED backlight modules, routers, mobile power sources, and smart meters. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

6435.TWO.summary: Sinopower Semiconductor, Inc. operates as a fabless IC design company in Taiwan. The company designs, markets, and sells power discrete devices, including MOSFET and IGBT; and high voltage power ICs. The company's products are used in various applications, such as computers comprising PCs and servers, as well as power suppliers, communication equipment, handheld devices, consumer products, industrials, etc. Sinopower Semiconductor, Inc. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6441.TWO.summary: Ibase Gaming Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells gaming systems worldwide. It offers gaming solutions for lottery terminals, kiosks, and casino slots. The company also provides OEM and turnkey ODM solutions for terminals, cabinets, class leading PC hardware, and gaming support peripherals. Ibase Gaming Inc. was founded in 2011 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6451.TW.summary: ShunSin Technology Holdings Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the assembly, testing, and sales of various integrated circuits related to semiconductors in Mainland China, the United States, Taiwan, Malaysia, Singapore, and internationally. It offers semiconductor integrated circuit, such as power amplifier (PA), antenna switch module, filter, duplexer, etc. packaging and testing services for communication modules of smart phones; wafer thinning, cutting, and packaging inspection services for module processes; sensors, including micro electro-mechanical systems (MEMS) packaging and testing services for gyroscopes, ambient light sensors, etc. for use in sensing module of smart mobile phone; optical transceiver module packaging and testing services for storage and transmission of enterprise servers and cloud servers; and hybrid integrated circuit module for medical electronics, such as microphone module for hearing aids. The company also provides assembling and testing of automotive electronic parts for vehicle smart keys and vehicle media control system; 3d sensing front-end modules for biometric module of smartphone; and smartwatch mainboard assembly and testing for personal sports and intelligent health monitoring. Its products include system in package module, including 2G/2.5G/3G/4G front end and PA, PA, WiFi front end, mobile WiFi, and antenna switch modules; optical transceivers; thick film integrated circuits; finger print sensor products; micro vibration motors; concentrated photovoltaic (CPV) modules comprising CPV front end modules, electrical and optical sub-assemblies, and receivers; and MEMS modules and sensors, such as accelerometers, gyroscopes, G-sensors, pressure and gesture sensors, light and proximity sensors, BAW filters, and TOF sensors. ShunSin Technology Holdings Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands. ShunSin Technology Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Foxconn (Far East) Limited.

6457.TWO.summary: Hycon Technology Corporation designs, produces, and sells mixed signal microcontroller units, and battery management and touch panel ICs in Taiwan and China. The company offers battery management ICs, such as single cell and multi-cell, and secondary protectors, as well as balance ICs and gas gauges; mixed signal microcontroller units, including microcontroller units, data converters, digital multi-function meters, AC impedance measurement, sensor signal conditioners, low-dropout voltage regulators, LCD controllers and drivers, and application specific standard parts; and capacitive touch ICs. Its products are used in no-switch electronic scale, blood pressure monitor, PIR detector, digital multi-meter, and touch panel applications. The company provides its products under the HYCON brand name. Hycon Technology Corporation was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6488.TWO.summary: GlobalWafers Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, and manufactures, semiconductor ingots and wafers in Taiwan and internationally. It offers silicon wafer and ingots; and annealed, diffusion, epitaxial, compound, polished, and SOI wafers. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan. GlobalWafers Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Sino-American Silicon Products Inc.

6494.TWO.summary: Nyquest Technology Co., Ltd. researches, designs, and sells integrated circuits (ICs). The company provides voice synthesizer ICs, 4-bit microcontrollers with voice/MIDI products, 8-bit microcontrollers, motor drivers, and other products. It offers LED control and drive, speech, and multi-channel speech/melody ICs; 8-Bit OTP MCU for home appliances; 8-bit MCU with LCD drivers; audio power amplifier ICs, low power LCD driver IC, high power motor driver ICs, 4-bit MCU with touch-keys and LED controllers, and 4-Bit MCU with universal remote controllers; and 32-bit MCUs. In addition, the company provides hardware and software development tools. The company offers its products through agents in Taiwan, Japan, Mainland China, Europe, Hong Kong, and the United States. Nyquest Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6515.TW.summary: WinWay Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies integrated circuit testing interfaces worldwide. Its products include high performance heat sinks, high performance test sockets, thermal control systems, changeover kits, direct docking probe cards, burn-in sockets, and contact element products. It also provides technical support services. The company serves semiconductor, opto-electronic, and IT industries. WinWay Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6531.TW.summary: AP Memory Technology Corporation operates as a fabless IC design and marketing company in Taiwan and internationally. It offers low power DRAM, PSRAM, and IoT RAM used in smart audio and video, waerables, Internet of Things, cellular and connectivity, automotive, AI, and IP service applications. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6533.TW.summary: Andes Technology Corporation engages in the research and developing, designing, manufacturing, and marketing of embedded processor intellectual property (IP), related hardware/software developing platform, and toolchains worldwide. The company offers AndeStar Architecture, a patented 32-bit/64-bit RISC-style CPU architecture; AndesCore, a series of 32-bit/64-bit CPUs for use in embedded applications; Andes Custom Extension that allows designers design their own CPU instructions on the already performance optimized AndesCore processors; and AndeShape Platform that contains three categories of products for system development with AndesCore processors. It also provides AndeSight IDE, an eclipse-based IDE that provides solutions to develop embedded applications; and AndeSoft SW Stack, which provides a set of software components, such as real-time operating system, Linux kernel and drivers, libraries, middleware, and application frameworks. The company offers RISC-V Solutions; network security solution; and replacement solutions for embedded applications, as well as licensing CPU IP and provides related services. Andes Technology Corporation was founded in 2005 is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6548.TWO.summary: Chang Wah Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells LED lead frame and molding compound materials in Taiwan. It offers LED and IC products, and premolds. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6552.TW.summary: JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. produces reel to reel chip on film that is applied to LCD in Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Sumiko Electronics Taiwan Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. in 2014. JMC Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

6568.TWO.summary: Rafael Microelectronics, Inc. manufactures and sells radio frequency (RF) integrated circuits. It offers IoT connectivity products, terrestrial/cable/satellite set-top box receivers, satellite broadcast reception and distribution systems, optical communication systems, and TV receivers, as well as provides RF IP and design services. The company offers its products in Taiwan, Europe, North America, China, Korea and Japan. Rafael Microelectronics, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6588.TWO.summary: East Tender Optoelectronics Corporation manufactures and sells optical thin film filters in Taiwan and internationally. It offers narrowband filter chips for use in the telecom industry applications, as well as custom narrowband filters for non telecom applications. The company also provides broadband filter chips, including banded skip filter chips, filter components for FTTx, CWDM filter components, and gain flattening filters; and customized products, such as coated WDM on pigtail for hi isolation application, IR-cut filters for digital still cameras and CCM applications, and R/G/B filters for digital lighting processing projectors. East Tender Optoelectronics Corporation was founded in 2000 and is based in Yilan City, Taiwan.

6594.TWO.summary: Alcorlink Corp., a fabless IC design company, provides device controller and image application solutions primarily in Taiwan. It offers I/O product/image application/others, which include flash and smart card readers, USB cameras, intelligent storage solutions, hub controllers, and MFi products. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6614.T.summary: Shikino High-Tech CO.,LTD engages in the development and manufacture of semiconductor inspection equipment, and product development businesses. The company offers semiconductor testing equipment, which includes monitored burn-in systems, analog IC test systems, and open short leakage systems primarily for the semiconductor post-production process; and image processing cameras, camera modules, and related products for use in various applications, including vending machines, ticketing machines, arcade games, digital signages, character codes, biometrics, various information terminals, robots, and surveillance cameras, as well as FA, transport, packaging, and medical equipment. It also provides embedded cameras and related products, such as USB output camera modules, digital YUV output camera modules, NTSC output camera modules, camera lenses, and customized cameras for industrial use; cameras for shops and related solutions; and IP cores, including MIPI IP core and JPEG IP core products. In addition, it offers intelligent camera module and semiconductor testing equipment; image solutions services support, and camera and related system development services; analog and digital LIS designs; testing and burn-in solutions; and DMS and EMS solutions. The company was formerly known as Shikino Electronics Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Shikino High-Tech CO.,LTD. in January 1992. Shikino High-Tech CO.,LTD. was founded in 1975 and is based in Uozu-shi, Japan.

6616.T.summary: Torex Semiconductor Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells integrated circuits (ICs) and active discrete components in Japan and internationally. The company offers DC/DC converters, voltage regulators and detectors, push button controllers, LED lighting drivers, load switches, power MOSFETs, temperature sensors, PLL clock generators, and transient voltage suppressors; charge pump, battery charge, hall, and oscillator ICs; and Shottky barrier, Zener, switching, bridge, and fast recovery diodes. Its products are used in consumer electronics, automotive products, industrial equipment, medical and healthcare equipment, and computers and communications products. Torex Semiconductor Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6625.T.summary: JALCO Holdings Inc. engages in real estate leasing and loan management businesses. The company provides management, accounting, general affair, and legal affair services, as well as merger and acquisition services. It is also involved in money lending; equipment engineering; and conservation and responsibilities businesses. In addition, the company engages in the manufacture and sale of electronic equipment, medieval travel technology machines, and equipment machines; and provides information processing machines and terminal equipment, other electronic equipment, and communication devices. JALCO Holdings Inc. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6640.TWO.summary: Gallant Micro. Machining Co., LTD. designs, manufactures, and sells front-end and back-end packaging and inspection equipment for manufacturing semiconductors in Taiwan, Hong Kong, and China. Its principal products include semiconductor process equipment, semiconductor detecting equipment, laser application equipment, precision machineries, and precision molds. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Gallant Micro. Machining Co., LTD. operates as a subsidiary of Gallant Precision Machining Co., Ltd.

6642.TWO.summary: Fuzetec Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells circuit protection solutions for electronic and electrical industries worldwide. The company offers radial leaded PPTC, surface mount polymer PTC, battery strap polymer PTC, and low Rho SMD polymer resettable fuses, as well as PPTC chips and discs. Its products are used in various applications, including telecommunications, networks, Smart phones, tablet and notebook PCs, computers and peripherals, automotives, instrumentation and industrial controls, power supplies, consumer electronics, primary and secondary batteries, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6643.TWO.summary: M31 Technology Corporation operates as a professional silicon intellectual property (IP) provider. It offers standard cell library, general purpose I/O library, special I/O, high level ESD cell, memory compiler, high speed interface IP, Analog IP, and other solutions. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6679.TWO.summary: Zilltek Technology Corp. operates as an analog and mixed signal IC design house in Taiwan. It designs and develops micro-electromechanical (MEMS) heterogeneous integrated circuits. The company offers analog, digital, and optics MEMS microphones; digital barometric pressure and temperature sensors; audio amplifiers; DC/DC converters; LDOs; and touch screen controllers. Its products are used in PCs, wearable devices, and TVs applications. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6693.TWO.summary: Inergy Technology Inc. engages in the development and sale of integrated power components that are optimized for system applications. It also provides integrated power modules for motor drives and ceiling fan air cleaners. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6695.TWO.summary: iCatch Technology, Inc. designs and sells fabless IC. The company offers automotive grade sensing camera module image signal processor for use in ADAS front cameras, intelligent rear view cameras, blind spot detection, and driver monitoring systems; and an automotive grade SoC for use in digital video recorders, and camera and driver monitoring systems. It also provides SoC for consumer imaging devices for use in digital still, action, home security, body worn, trail, 3D sensing, surveillance, and VR cameras, as well as digital video recorders, factory automation, automated stores, and home appliances. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6697.T.summary: Techpoint, Inc., a fabless semiconductor company, designs, markets, and sells mixed-signal integrated circuits for various video applications in the security surveillance and automotive markets. Its integrated circuits enable the transmission of high definition (HD) video content over long cable distances to facilitate the display, storage, or processing of video content. The company's products include HD-TVI transmitters and receivers, HD-SDI receivers, automotive camera processors, and HD LCD controllers. Techpoint, Inc. targets video applications that receive and process HD analog video signals, including surveillance cameras and surveillance digital video recorders, as well as cameras in automobiles. The company sells its products to distributors and original design manufacturers in China, Taiwan, South Korea, and Japan. Techpoint, Inc. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in San Jose, California.

6707.T.summary: Sanken Electric Co., Ltd. manufactures, purchases, and sells electric equipment and apparatus. The company operates through two segments, Semiconductor Devices Business and Power System Business. Its Semiconductor Devices Business segment manufactures and sells power modules, power ICs, control ICs, hall-effect ICs, bipolar transistors, MOSFET, IGBT, thyristors, rectifier diodes, and light emitting diodes (LEDs). This segment serves the automobiles, home appliances, industrial machinery, audio visual and office automation equipment, telecommunications equipment, and LED lighting sectors. The company's Power System Business segment manufactures and sells uninterruptible power supplies, inverters, DC power supplies, airway beacon systems, switching mode power supply units and transformers. It also undertakes electronic, telecommunication, and other construction works. The company has operations in Japan, China, Korea, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Toho Sanken Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sanken Electric Co., Ltd. in June 1962. Sanken Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Niiza, Japan.

6716.TWO.summary: PADAUK Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells microcontrollers. Its products are used in interactive smart toys, remote control appliances, smart household appliances, industrial grade chips, and high-efficiency brushless DC motors. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6719.TWO.summary: uPI Semiconductor Corp., an IC design company, designs and manufactures analog and mixed-signal power management solutions in electronic systems in Taiwan and internationally. It offers Power Management products, such as DC/DC buck controllers and converters, DC/DC boost converters, power device drivers, low dropout regulators, power switch ICs, LED driver ICs, charging ICs, and voltage and current consoles; Battery Management products, including PTIC and charger ICs; and low, medium, and high voltage power MOSFET products. The company also provides application and interface, ultra speed, tiny package speed, high surge, and high voltage TVS products; OP-amplifiers; bio sensors; and GaN solutions. uPI Semiconductor Corp. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6723.T.summary: Renesas Electronics Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, designs, manufactures, sells, and services semiconductors in Japan, China, North America, Europe, rest of Asia, and internationally. It operates through Automotive Business and Industrial/Infrastructure/IoT Business segments. The company offers microcontrollers (MCUs) and microprocessors; analog products, such as amplifiers, audio and video, data converters, power line communication, and switches and multiplexer products; automotive products, including battery management, interface, power devices, power management, sensors, video and display, wireless power, system-on-chips, and MCU products; and clock ICs and clock timing solutions, such as specific clocks, clock distribution and generation, jitter attenuators, and crystal oscillator products. It also provides interface and connectivity products, including buffers, wireless modules, data compression, industrial Ethernet, IO-link line driver, memory interface, optical interconnect, photocouplers/optocouplers, power line communication, signal integrity, telecom datacom and interface, USB switches and hubs, video broadcast software and ASICs, VME, and wireless broadband modem products. In addition, the company offers memory and logic products, such as low power static random access memory; power and power management products; RF and microwave products; sensor products; SMD, MIL-STD-883 (/883), and Class-V/Q products. Further, it provides automotive information devices, such as in-vehicle infotainment and instrument panels. The company offers its products for automotive, communication, healthcare, computing, home and building, industrial, personal electronic, technology, and other applications. Renesas Electronics Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6730.T.summary: AXELL Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells semiconductor ICs and printed circuit boards with embedded semiconductor ICs in Japan. The company offers multifunction and LED driver LSI products specialized for use in pachinko and pachi slot-machines; and graphics LSIs for industrial embedded systems. It is also involved in the research, development, and sale of elemental technologies related to graphics, sound, machine learning, etc.; information securities; and block chain. In addition, the company offers various informational services using the Internet; develops and sells software; and designs, manufactures, and sells applied equipment, as well as engages in the secondhand articles trading and other businesses. AXELL Corporation was founded in 1996 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

6769.T.summary: THine Electronics, Inc., a fabless semiconductor company, engages in the planning, designing, and sale of mixed-signal LSIs in Japan and internationally. It offers system modules, V-by-One HS products for flat panel displays that require higher frame rates and resolutions, V-by-One products for EMI and data transmission for long distance, transceivers, repeaters, low voltage differential signaling products, LED and motor drivers, image signal processors, timing controllers, video ADC products, power management ICs, and power modules. The company provides its products for use in cameras, USB cameras, LCD panels, projectors, multifunction printers, smartphones, and tablets, as well as medical, automotive, and gaming applications. THine Electronics, Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6770.TWO.summary: Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corporation provides chip design and manufacturing services. It offers foundry, design, overhaul, manufacturing, and memory wafer testing services. The company was formerly known as Maxchip Electronics Corp and changed its name to Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corporation in September 2018. Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corporation was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan. Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corp. operates as a subsidiary of Powerchip Technology Corporation.

6786.TWO.summary: Istart-Tek Inc. provides memory testing and repairing solutions for SoC designers worldwide. The company is based in Zhubei City, Taiwan.

6789.TWO.summary: VisEra Technologies Company Limited manufactures and sells electronic spare parts in Taiwan. It also researches, develops, designs, manufactures, sells, packages, and tests color filters. In addition, the company offers image sensor foundry solutions, which include CMOS image sensor that performs the role of an electronic film in digital photography equipment; and wafer level testing and wafer level optical thin film services. Its CMOS image sensor products are used in various areas, such as digital cameras, camera phones, web cameras, notebooks, security devices, automobiles, and miniature imaging devices used in medical applications. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. VisEra Technologies Company Limited is a subsidiary of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company Limited.

6832.T.summary: AOI Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic parts in Japan. It offers integrated circuits, modules, thick film thermal print heads, optical sensors, LED products, chip resistor networks, and micro electro mechanical system devices. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Takamatsu, Japan.

6875.T.summary: MegaChips Corporation provides chip solutions in Japan. The company offers application specific integrated circuits; MEMS timing devices; automotive ethernet PHY; wired communication networks; and LCD timing controllers for various input and output interfaces, such as HDTVs and smart devices. MegaChips Corporation was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

688008.SS.summary: Montage Technology Co., Ltd., an integrated circuits design company, provides IC solutions for cloud computing and data center markets in the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Montage Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Montage Technology Group Limited.

688018.SS.summary: Espressif Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd., a fabless semiconductor company, designs and sells Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, low-power IoT solutions in China. The company offers wireless SoCs; modules combining Wi-Fi and BT/BLE; and development boards, as well as software products. It also provides hardware services. The company serves customers in industrial automation, wearable electronic, healthcare, consumer electronic, and smart home sectors. Espressif Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

688188.SS.long_name: Shanghai Friendess Electronic Technology Corporation Limited
688188.SS.summary: Shanghai Friendess Electronic Technology Corporation Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of laser cutting control products and software. It offers laser cutting control systems, high-precision visual positioning systems, integrated CNC systems, and other accessories, as well as CypCut, HypCut ultra high power, and CypTube square tube laser cutting control software. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Shanghai, China.

688200.SS.long_name: Beijing Huafeng Test & Control Technology Co., Ltd.
688200.SS.summary: Beijing Huafeng Test & Control Technology Co., Ltd. provides semiconductor IC testing systems and kits worldwide. The company is based in Beijing, China.

688286.SS.summary: MEMSensing Microsystems (Suzhou, China) Co., Ltd. provides MEMS sensor products and solutions in China. The company offers MEMS microphones, pressure sensors, and inertial sensors for various industries, including consumer electronics, industrial control, medical electronics and automotive, etc. It also provides MEMS design services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

688396.SS.summary: China Resources Microelectronics Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the open foundry, integrated circuits (IC) design, IC testing and packaging, and discrete device businesses. The company provides IC manufacturing services for fables design houses and integrated device manufacturers. It also offers analog and power process technologies, including mixed signal, complementary metal-oxide-semiconductor (CMOS) logic, planar and trench double diffused metal oxide semiconductor (DMOS), an integration of bipolar and CMOS technology (BiCMOS), and DMOS devices (BCDMOS). In addition, China Resources Microelectronics Limited involves in the design and development of semiconductor IC products, such as MCU and audio and video processing SoC; analog and mixed signal ICs for power management and light emitting diode driving products; consumer ICs and wafers, including single chip radio circuits, audio amplifiers, calculation amplifiers, encoder/decoder circuits, LCD's, music voice, circuit for clock and watch, UPS and MCU, and photoelectric coupled receiver chips. Further, the company provides IC assembly, testing, and packaging services for semiconductor enterprises; and engages in the development and manufacture of power semiconductor discrete devices for energy saving lightings, home appliances, industrial control devices, and personal computers. It has operations in Mainland China, other countries in Asia, the United States, and Europe. The company was formerly known as CSMC Technologies Corporation and changed its name to China Resources Microelectronics Limited in 2008. China Resources Microelectronics Limited was founded in 1997. The company is based in Wuxi, China, and is considered a Red Chip company due to its listing on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. As of November 2, 2011, China Resources Microelectronics Limited operates as a subsidiary of China Resources (Holdings) Co.,Ltd.

688508.SS.summary: Wuxi Chipown Micro-electronics limited engages in the research and development, design, and supply of analog and mixed signal integrated circuits (ICs) in China. The company offers low voltage products, such as DC-DC, car charger IC, LED backlight, battery charger, current limiter, reset and detect, and high power white LED products; and high voltage products, including AC-DC, LED lighting, half-bridge driver, display driver, NeoFET, and other products. Its products are used in computers and peripheral products, mobile phones, personal digital terminals, home appliances, flat panel displays, and other fields. Wuxi Chipown Micro-electronics limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Wuxi, China.

688521.SS.summary: VeriSilicon Microelectronics (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. provides platform-based custom silicon and semiconductor IP licensing services in China and internationally. The company operates under the Silicon Platform as a Service business model.
